title: True happines, or, King Dauids choice begunne in sermons, and now digested into a treatise. By Mr. William Struther, preacher at Edinburgh.
author: Struther, William, 1578-1633.
publisher: Printed by R. Young, for John Wood, and are to be sold at his shop on the south side of the high street, a little above the Crosse,
notes: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
